title: Born Rich
resume: Born Rich is a 2009 TVB television drama produced and created by Chong Wai-kin. The drama was promoted as TVB's "grand production" for 2009, and featured an ensemble cast. Running for 39 episodes, the last two episodes were of two hours each.
